text: On the Sunday, the day of her death, she had gone out in the evening at about seven not be gone for long. According to Miss Hone, she had not been carrying a handbag, but she believed she had had a small purse.
handwritten_text: On the Sunday, the day of her death, she had gone out in the evening at about seven not be gone for long. According to Miss Hone, she had not been carrying a handbag, but she believed she had had a small purse.
